property.name: description
property.value: The spot where [[Clover]] enters the Underground. In ''[[ut:Undertale|Undertale]]'', this is also the location where [[ut:Frisk|Frisk]] first falls and where [[ut:Chara|Chara]] is implied to be buried.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: [[Clover]] 進入地底世界的地點。在 ''[[ut:Undertale|Undertale]]'' 中，這裡也是[[ut:Frisk|主角]]首次墜落的地點，同時也是[[ut:Chara|第一位人類]]的埋葬地點。

property.name: description
property.value: This switch is meant to be the wrong switch for the puzzle. [[Clover]] pulls it after the puzzle fails to complete, sending them into the Dark Ruins.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 這個開關原本就是解謎中錯誤的選項。當謎題無法完成時，[[Clover]] 拉下了它，結果他掉入了黑暗廢墟中。

property.name: description
property.value: Toriel interrupts the battle between [[Clover]] and the [[Froggit]]. She guides them through the the [[Ruins]] up until they fall into the [[Dark Ruins]].

property.name: zh_description
property.value: Toriel 打斷了 [[Clover]] 與 [[Froggit]] 之間的戰鬥。她引導 Clover 穿越 [[廢墟]]，直到 Clover 掉到[[黑暗廢墟]]為止。

property.name: description
property.value: This puzzle is solved by pressing the four switches on the darker section of the floor. [[Toriel]] solves this for [[Clover]].

properties.property:
通往下一個房間的門會在踩在未標記路徑上的開關後，再拉下拉桿時解鎖。
[[Toriel]] 會自動解開這個謎題。

property.name: description
property.value: This puzzle is meant to be solved by pressing the levers on the path to lower the spikes. [[Toriel]] made it easier by adding arrows pointing to the correct switches. She encourages [[Clover]] to solve it themself but attempts to help them when the path does not open after the puzzle is completed.

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 必須拉下兩個開關才能解鎖通往下一個房間的門。[[Toriel]] 在 [[Clover]] 抵達前已經標記了正確的開關。但當謎題完成後路徑仍未開啟，Toriel 試圖協助 Clover 拉下另一個開關。

properties.property: "Only the fearless may proceed. Brave ones, foolish ones. Both walk not the middle road."

property.name: zh_description
property.value: 只有無懼的人才能前進。勇敢的人，愚蠢的人都不走中間的路。

property.name: description
property.value: Tells Clover to press the confirm key to read signs.

properties.property:
也請同樣按下這個按鈕。
- TORIEL
